Mine Seeker is an enhanced version of classic mine sweeper game. There are 3 different grid sizes available: 4x6, 5x10, 6x15 and 4 different number of mines: 6,10,15, 20. GAME RULES When the player taps a cell without a mine, it triggers a scan of the cell\'s row and column then displays then number of hidden mines found in its row and column. SCAN: users are allowed to use maximum 2 scans on a cell with a mine We do not own the copyright of images and sounds used in this application.
